document.full_text: department store operator macy's inc  posted a 7.4 percent increase in may at stores open at least a year, beating analysts expectations and sending its shares up more than 2 percent.
document.title: macy's may sales beat estimates
lines_and_colors: department store operator macy's inc  posted a 7.4 percent increase in may at stores open at least a year, beating analysts expectations and sending its shares up more than 2 percent.
